encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Music teacher in Vienna in 1923, located at Vienna I, Doblhoffgasse 7; daughter of composer Kitty von Escherich.

Miss Escherich was proposed by Baronesse Emma Fischer (OJ 11/2, [2], February 23, 1923) as one of five young female music teachers to whom copies of the first three issues of Schenker's Der Tonwille were to be sent in order to disseminate Schenker's ideas. The copies were delivered by Schenker to Baronesse Fischer on February 27, and Schenker received thanks from Escherich on March 16.
